name: One button - The only button you'll ever need
description:
The only button you'll ever need.


A button with a lot of options. Uses the latest Figma props for instance swapping and variations.


10 different base shell shapes

  1. Square
  2. Rounded sm
  3. Rounded md
  4. Rounded lg
  5. Pill
  6. Chamfer half
  7. Chamfer half alt
  8. Chamfer full
  9. Skew left
  10. Skew right


Square and rounded shapes also come with a sub type of outlined.


Options include:

  • Gradient
  • Button color
  • Button text color
  • Button label
  • Label color
  • Alignment type (between or centered)
  • Show / hide end and start icons
  • End icon
  • Start icon
  • End icon color
  • Start icon color
  • End icon cover
  • End icon cover color
  • Outer ring
